body_html:
In general, we prefer tf.contrib.training.create_train_op. There, you simply create the optimizer you need, no separate argument for the learning rate, and you do what you need to do.

I'm reluctant to change the behavior of this, we should deprecate this function instead.

body:
In general, we prefer [`tf.contrib.training.create_train_op`](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/contrib/training/create_train_op). There, you simply create the optimizer you need, no separate argument for the learning rate, and you do what you need to do. 

I'm reluctant to change the behavior of this, we should deprecate this function instead.
